CustomField.description: Formula to show public or private sector based on ereg Organization structure type (e.g., AS, ENK) and Institutional sector code.
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( LOWER(INT_OrganizationalStructureDesc__c) = 'kommune', LOWER(Parent.INT_OrganizationalStructureDesc__c) = 'kommune', TAG_UltimateParentSectorCode__c = '6500', TAG_UltimateParentSectorCode__c = '1510', TAG_UltimateParentSectorCode__c = '1520', LOWER(INT_OrganizationalStructureDesc__c) = 'staten', LOWER(Parent.INT_OrganizationalStructureDesc__c) = 'staten', TAG_UltimateParentSectorCode__c = '6100', TAG_UltimateParentSectorCode__c = '1110', TAG_UltimateParentSectorCode__c = '1120', TAG_UltimateParentSectorCode__c = '3100', TAG_UltimateParentSectorCode__c = '3900' ), 'OFFENTLIG', 'PRIVAT')
CustomField.label: Sektor
